item.title: Java 8+: Using Collectors as reducers
item.description: A simple example to show how to use Collectors as reducers in Java 8+. Say, we have a simple Transaction class consists of the currency and the value of the transaction. Transaction class is sprinkled with Lombok annotation to make use of Builder. @Value @Builder public static class Transaction { String currency; int value; } And given the following set of data: GBP Transactions = 2, USD Transactions = 1, CAD Transactions = 1
